c:component.c:abstract: Alacritty is a modern terminal emulator that comes with sensible defaults, but allows for extensive configuration. By integrating with other applications, rather than reimplementing their functionality, it manages to provide a flexible set of features with high performance. The supported platforms currently consist of BSD, Linux, macOS and Windows.

c:entry.c:title: INSTALLATION
c:entry.c:sourceContent:
$ brew install --cask alacritty $ brew tap homebrew/cask-fonts $ brew install font-meslo-lg-nerd-font $ brew install powerlevel10k $ echo "source $(brew --prefix)/share/powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k.zsh-theme" >> ~/.zprofile $ source ~/.zprofile $ p10k configure
$ mkdir ~/.config/alacritty $ vi ~/.config/alacritty/alacritty.toml
> #[env] > #TERM = "xterm-256color" > > [window] > padding.x = 5 > padding.y = 5 > > #decorations = "Buttonless" > > opacity = 0.8 > blur = true > option_as_alt = "Both" > > [font] > normal.family = "MesloLGS Nerd Font Mono" > size = 16
$ cd ~/.config/alacritty && git clone https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty-theme.git $ mv alacritty-theme themes
$ curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/josean-dev/dev-environment-files/main/.config/alacritty/themes/themes/coolnight.toml --output ~/.config/alacritty/themes/themes/coolnight.toml
$ vi ~/.config/alacritty/alacritty.toml > import = [ > "~/.config/alacritty/themes/themes/coolnight.toml" > ]
